text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump #BillBarr TRUMP PUPPET! This is really stupid! I’m religious and have no problem watching church service in the safety of my own home! Even if service starts up; I’m NOT attending UNTIL it’s safe! Churches are to crowded and dangerous https://t.co/267poKKDla
